content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
The target structure consists of two separate constructions:

1. Left Construction:
   - 6 blocks total: 2 green rectangular blocks on top of 4 orange cylindrical blocks
   - 2 layers: bottom layer (4 orange cylinders) and top layer (2 green rectangles)

2. Right Construction:
   - 3 blocks total: 1 orange horizontal cylinder on top of 1 green vertical rectangle, with 1 yellow cylinder at the bottom
   - 3 layers: bottom layer (yellow cylinder), middle layer (green rectangle), top layer (orange cylinder)

## Spatial Relationships

1. Left Construction:
   - Base: 4 orange vertical cylinders arranged in a square pattern
   - Top: 2 green rectangular blocks placed side by side horizontally on top of the orange cylinders

2. Right Construction:
   - Bottom: 1 yellow vertical cylinder
   - Middle: 1 green vertical rectangular block placed on top of the yellow cylinder
   - Top: 1 orange horizontal cylinder placed across the top of the green rectangle

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

## Left Construction:
- 4× Block #6 (orange vertical cylinder)
- 2× Block #4 (green horizontal rectangular block)

## Right Construction:
- 1× Block #8 (orange horizontal cylinder)
- 1× Block #3 (green vertical rectangular block)
- 1× Block #11 (yellow vertical cylinder)

# Assembly Order

```
{
   Step1: Move block with index 6
   Step2: Move block with index 6
   Step3: Move block with index 6
   Step4: Move block with index 6
   Step5: Move block with index 4
   Step6: Move block with index 4
   Step7: Move block with index 11
   Step8: Move block with index 3
   Step9: Move block with index 8
}
```
